Lyric:
[00:19.89]You're the light, you're the night
[00:22.24]You're the color of my blood
[00:24.79]You're the cure, you're the pain
[00:27.34]You're the only thing I wanna touch
[00:32.47]Never knew that it could mean so much, so much
[00:39.92]You're the feel, I don't care
[00:42.48]Cause I've never been so high
[00:44.98]Follow me to the dark
[00:47.42]Let me take you past our satellites
[00:52.64]You can see the world you brought to life, to life
[01:00.25]So love me like you do, love me like you do
[01:05.55]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[01:10.45]Touch me like you do, touch me like you do
[01:17.65]What are you waiting for?
[01:20.45]Fading in, fading out
[01:22.90]On the edge of paradise
[01:25.40]Every inch of your skin is a holy gray I've got to find
[01:33.08]Only you can set my heart on fire, on fire
[01:40.25]Yeah, I'll let you set the pace
[01:45.60]Cause I'm not thinking straight
[01:50.64]My head spinning around I can't see clear no more
[01:58.02]What are you waiting for?
[02:01.24]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[02:06.08]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[02:11.13]Touch me like you do, touch me like you do
[02:18.14]What are you waiting for?
[02:21.34]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[02:26.40]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[02:31.60]Touch me like you do, touch me like you do
[02:38.30]What are you waiting for?
[02:51.50]I'll let you set the pace
[02:56.35]Cause I'm not thinking straight
[03:01.30]My head spinning around I can't see clear no more
[03:10.76]What are you waiting for?
[03:14.53]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[03:19.37]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[03:24.37]Touch me like you do, touch me like you do
[03:31.37]What are you waiting for?
[03:34.64]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[03:39.55]Love me like you do, love me like you do
[03:44.76]Touch me like you do, touch me like you do
[03:51.59]What are you waiting for?
